title: Chocolate and Hazelnut Mascarpone Cheesecakes
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) amaretti biscuits, crushed', '1 tablespoon melted unsalted butter', '110g (4 oz) 70% plain chocolate, chopped', '110ml (4 fl oz) double cream', '110g (4 oz) mascarpone, beaten', '60g (2 oz) hazelnuts, toasted and finely chopped', '30g (1 oz) fresh rasberries', '2 mint sprigs, for garnish']
